title: Aside from Alan Shearer, who are the Newcastle United legends in which NUFC fans need to know? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the era actually. During the 90’s when they were challenging for titles, under Kevin Keegan, they had stellar names like Peter Beardsley, Andy Cole, David Ginola and Les Ferdinand who were great players and goalscorers. During the early 2000’s, players like Shay Given, Steve Harper, Nolberto Solano, Stephen Carr, Gary Speed, Craig Bellamy were very popular with the fans and can be considered as legends.

They may not be club legends but they had a considerable contribution. Tim Krul (GK) 175 appearancesShola Amoebi (ST) 397 appearances and 79 goalsSteveN Taylor (CB)Fabricio Coloccini (CB) Club captain for 5 seasonsJonas Gutierrez (MF)
Jackie Milburn, Malcolm MacDonald, Peter Beardsley, Chris Waddle, Paul Gascoigne, Andy Cole, David Ginola
